## isUrl

Assert string type, filled and valid URL. The max length of URL is 2048 characters.

### Parameters

-   `value`  

Returns **[boolean][5]** 

## isUrlOrEmpty

Assert string type, empty string or valid URL. The max length of URL is 2048 characters.

### Parameters

-   `value`  

Returns **[boolean][5]**
